document_data.mainbody:
The Slime domain was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like clerics with spells and powers related to slime.
They also gained the ability to rebuke and command oozes much as an evil cleric could rebuke and command undead.
Novice spellcasters were able to use the grease, melfs acid arrow, and poison spells. Clerics of some experience could cast rusting grasp, evards black tentacles, and transmute rock to mud. Those that were masters of this domain had access to destruction, power word, blind, and implosion.
